results.title: Simvastatin attenuates spatial memory impairment via inhibiting microgliosis and apoptotic cell death against ethanol induced neurotoxicity in the developing rat hippocampus.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates aluminium chloride-induced neurobehavioral impairments through activation of TGF-beta1/ SMAD2 and GSK3beta/beta-catenin signalling pathways.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ improved the @<m>DISEASE_Memory_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory deterioration@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Aluminum_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077410 @@@AlCl3@@@ with significant recovery of the histopathological changes.

results.title: Intranasal Carrier-Free Nanomodulator Addresses Both Symptomatology and Etiology of Alzheimer's Disease by Restoring Neuron Plasticity and Reprogramming Lesion Microenvironment.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we developed a carrier-free nanomodulator (NanoDS) through the self-assembly of @CHEMICAL_Donepezil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077265 @@@donepezil@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for direct nose-to-brain delivery.

results.title: Statin related memory dysfunction in a Nigerian woman: a case report.
results.text_hl: This case report is on a @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Memory_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory deficits@@@ which adversely affected activities of daily living.
